PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02792011-03-03,  ,  NR,  CRA,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectSusan Gill Remission Order
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits interest in the amount of $12,592.51, paid or payable under Part I of the Income Tax Act by SUSAN GILL for the 1982, 1983 and 1984 taxation years, having accrued during the period beginning on January 1, 1987 and ending on December 31, 2000, and all relevant interest on it.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2011-0019 Publication Date: 2011-03-16
AttachmentsAttachment
